'''''The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition''''' is a special edition album comprising of the soundtrack from ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'', by [[Howard Shore]]. It was released digitally and on CD on [[11 December]] [[2012]].<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Doug Adams]]|articleurl=http://www.musicoflotr.com/2012/11/the-hobbit-unexpected-journey.html|articlename=The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey Soundtrack Album Coming December 11|dated=1-November-2012|website=[http://www.musicoflotr.com Doug Adam's Blog]|accessed=1-November-2012}}</ref>
